tool_description: Checks technician availability and skill matching for work order assignments, considering schedules and certifications.

work_order_ids.description: List of work order IDs to check technician availability for

required_skills.description: Specific skills required for the work orders

error_messages: Work orders not found: One or more work_order_ids do not exist.
Invalid date range: check_date_range_start must be before check_date_range_end.
Invalid workload hours: max_workload_hours must be between 1 and 16.
No qualified technicians: No technicians available with required skills in the specified time range.
usage: Provide work_order_ids and date range, optionally specify skill and preference constraints. Returns available technicians and optimal assignments.

available_technicians.description: List of technician IDs available for the work orders

recommended_assignments.description: Recommended work order to technician assignments

skill_match_scores.description: Skill matching scores (0-100) for each recommended assignment

total_labor_hours.description: Total estimated labor hours for all assignments
